Ann_Arbor.Mary Markley Hall:
Mary Markley Hall (Markley) is a residence hall operated by the University of Michigan University Housing in Ann Arbor.


== Hall profile ==
Markley houses approximately 1,180 students, 505 of which are female and 675 of which are male - 100% first-year students excluding the Resident Advisors. Markley is home to University Housing's First Year Experience Program (FYE).
